creator.description:
Labeler for identifying AI imagery.

Please send a report for appeals. We do not regularly check this account for tags.

Our guidelines:
https://trail-buckthorn-014.notion.site/Bluesky-AI-Imagery-Labeler-Moderator-Handbook-65ef75d92a0e4faab0ad2925fc35c85

locales.description: Posts that contain images with generative AI modifications. For example, AI upscaling.
locales.name: AI Modified

locales.description: User has an AI avatar or banner on their profile.
locales.name: AI Avatar or Banner

locales.description: Users who have been known to post some AI imagery, although it is not their primary content.
locales.name: User - Occasional AI Imagery

locales.description: Users who frequently or predominately post AI images.
locales.name: User - Frequent AI Imagery

locales.description: Posts that contain images created with generative AI.
locales.name: AI Imagery
